comments.body: The hyperlinks in the PR came from Microsoft, and the first purpose is SQL compliant. Can we remove this line?
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,16 @@
+-- tests for decimals handling in operations
+-- Spark draws its inspiration byt Hive implementation

comments.body: Why create a new test file instead of adding more cases in `decimalArithmeticOperations.sql`?
